name: Prototron
description:
PROTOTRON is an Tron like game ! Is a 2 players duel game !

Developed with unity the controls are made for an azerty keyboard (an update will be made to change the controls)

CONTROLS

PLAYER 1 (Left Ship)
PLAYER 1 (Right Ship)Turn Left : QTurn Left : Left Arrow
Turn Right : DTurn Right : Right Arrow
Special Power (teleportation) : ZSpecial Power (Speed Boost) : Up Arrow
